1.title: The beginning of my journey
1.description: My journey commenced with Visual Basic, swiftly transitioning to Java.

2.title: Desktop and Game development
2.description: I started developing substantial projects using Java and C++, which ultimately served thousands of users. Additionally, I delved into the realm of reverse engineering.

3.title: Fullstack development
3.description: I embarked on full-stack web development, initially utilizing PHP and the Laravel (MVC) framework, and subsequently expanding my expertise to encompass various JavaScript frameworks.
